title: Introducing The Podium: Daily Coverage from the 2018 Winter Olympic Games
description: The first NBC Olympics podcast from the world's biggest sporting event. Join the team covering the Winter Games from the ground in PyeongChang. Hosts Lauren Shehadi and Tom Farrey, with reporter Tim Struby, bring you daily competition updates and the stories behind the games. And K-pop, of course. Lots of K-pop.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
